name: INTERSTELLAR ROGUE SOUNDTRACK
detailed_description:
THE SOUNDTRACK TO THE GAME INTERSTELLAR ROGUE AND 1 CRAZY BONUS TRACK ABOUT CATS!

**(ALL IN COMPRESSED ZIP FILE. MP3 FORMAT)**

TRACK LIST:

1-LOW LITE

2-AVIATOR

3-I SAW THE SUN

4-INNOCENCE

5-INNOCENCE DNB REMIX

6-PANORAMIC

7-SON RISE

8-WISDOM SHE KNOWS

9-TO THE MOON

10-XENOX++

11-THESE ROADS ARE MINE

12-WAR 4 THE WAY

13-FLUFFY CATS BONUS TRACK

14-JUX OCEAN RIDE

(TO FIND MUSIC RIGHT CLICK INTERSTELLAR ROGUE THEN GO TO PROPERTIES, BROWSE LOCAL FILES, IT WILL BE IN THE GAME FOLDER)

short_description: THE SOUNDTRACK TO THE GAME INTERSTELLAR ROGUE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2+ GHZ 2 cores
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with Pixel Shader/Vertex Shader 2.0
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: MP3 PLAYER
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3+ GHZ 4 cores
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with Pixel Shader/Vertex Shader 2.0
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: MP3 PLAYER

legal_notice: KINGSGUARDGAMES do not collect, sell or distribute personal information from players.
